p: Analysis (McKechnie, Coe, Gerson, & Wolf, 2016; Wolf, Coe, Gerson, & McKechnie, 2017) of the quality of the data compiled in Khaliq et al. ( 2014) identified issues with T uc but not T lc (see responses by Hof, Fritz, et al., 2017; Hof, Khaliq, Prinzinger, Böhning‐Gaese, & Pfenninger, 2017). Some T uc data are of lesser quality due to small sample sizes or weak measurement protocols, so we only use the T uc data for a coarse analysis of warm range boundaries mentioned in our discussion. We omitted T uc measurements that were found to be of poor quality [“No UCT” or “NA‐” categories; we kept values based on low sample sizes due to the tentative nature of our analyses].
